languages.text: "Паства навеки сохранит в сердцах проповедь Вашей Светлости. Благодарю, что средь бесчисленных дел нашли время для заботы о душах подданных".

"The flock will forever preserve the words of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s sermon in their hearts. Thank you for finding the time to take care of your subjects' souls in the midst of your countless labours."
languages.original_text: "Паства навеки сохранит в сердцах проповедь Вашей Светлости. Благодарю, что средь бесчисленных дел нашли время для заботы о душах подданных".

languages.text: "Die Herde wird die Predigt Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} für immer im Herzen tragen. Danke, dass Ihr Euch trotz Eurer zahllosen Verpflichtungen die Zeit genommen habt, die Seelen Euer Untertanen zu pflegen."
languages.original_text: "The flock will forever preserve the words of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s sermon in their hearts. Thank you for finding the time to take care of your subjects' souls in the midst of your countless labours."

traits.locale_text: "Die Herde wird die Predigt Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} für immer im Herzen tragen. Danke, dass Ihr Euch trotz Eurer zahllosen Verpflichtungen die Zeit genommen habt, die Seelen Euer Untertanen zu pflegen.

languages.text: « Les fidèles garderont à jamais dans leur cœur les paroles du sermon de Votre Seigneurie. Merci d'avoir pris le temps de veiller sur l'âme de vos sujets, alors même que vous devez avoir tant à faire. »
languages.original_text: "The flock will forever preserve the words of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s sermon in their hearts. Thank you for finding the time to take care of your subjects' souls in the midst of your countless labours."

traits.locale_text: « Les fidèles garderont à jamais dans leur cœur les paroles du sermon de Votre Seigneurie. Merci d'avoir pris le temps de veiller sur l'âme de vos sujets, alors même que vous devez avoir tant à faire. »

languages.text: «El rebaño albergará por siempre las palabras de su sermón en su corazón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Gracias por sacar tiempo para velar por las almas de sus súbditos en el desempeño de sus innumerables quehaceres».
languages.original_text: "The flock will forever preserve the words of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s sermon in their hearts. Thank you for finding the time to take care of your subjects' souls in the midst of your countless labours."

traits.locale_text: «El rebaño albergará por siempre las palabras de su sermón en su corazón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Gracias por sacar tiempo para velar por las almas de sus súbditos en el desempeño de sus innumerables quehaceres».

languages.text: 「皆は陛下の説教の言葉を永遠に心に留めることでしょう。数知れないご苦労の中、お時間を取って臣民の魂のケアをしてくださりありがとうございます」
languages.original_text: "The flock will forever preserve the words of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s sermon in their hearts. Thank you for finding the time to take care of your subjects' souls in the midst of your countless labours."

traits.locale_text: 「皆は陛下の説教の言葉を永遠に心に留めることでしょう。数知れないご苦労の中、お時間を取って臣民の魂のケアをしてくださりありがとうございます」

languages.text: “您的牧群始终铭记您的训诫，感谢您在百忙中抽出时间，照顾您臣民的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "The flock will forever preserve the words of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s sermon in their hearts. Thank you for finding the time to take care of your subjects' souls in the midst of your countless labours."

traits.locale_text: “您的牧群始终铭记您的训诫，感谢您在百忙中抽出时间，照顾您臣民的灵魂。”

languages.text: "Hizmetkârları, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin sözlerini sonsuza dek kalbinde taşıyacak. Sayısız meşgaleniz içinde tebaalarınızın ruhlarıyla ilgilenecek zaman ayırdığınız için teşekkür ederiz."
languages.original_text: "The flock will forever preserve the words of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s sermon in their hearts. Thank you for finding the time to take care of your subjects' souls in the midst of your countless labours."
